task.summary: Default task
fixed the alignnone class - missing the period
cleaned up functions.php and functions.js files. Also updated some css and minified files.
added small fixes before theme repository submission
made fixes based on feedback from WP theme review. Resubmitting this as V1.03
made small fixes on enqueueing based on feedback from WP theme review. Resubmitting this as V1.04
updated to v1.04
removed if statement stopping unset menu fallback from showing
improved design of sidebar and dropdowns above 900px. Added accessibility fixes. Fixed menu fallback.
color contrast issues fixed.
new screenshot
finished next round of accessibility updates.
final accessibility updates. Color contrast increased on links on :hover & :focus at mobile width. JS added to fix Chrome & IE9 bug in handling the skip-to-content link
positioned toggle as 'relative' so if title is too long it goes under instead of overlapping (making the toggle button unclickable).
updated namespace, fixed embedded video bug in firefox, added copyright, moved word-wrap to body and pre only, updated hardware acceleration.
updated missing namespace update.
fixed missing social icons
Updated loop-pagination to not add markup if empty. v1.12
fixed loop pagination error & updated support widget.
* added disqus fix * added validation/sanitization for customizer functions
* updated conditional ie logic in head
* added grunt
*unminified all 3rd party scripts
* now enqueueing one JS file (production.min.js)
*updated Custom Meta Boxes and how it's included
* added custom control for social media icons so the 'http:// is automatically included.
* added schema microdata for blog posts on archives & post pages
* added schema microdata for logo
* internationalization complete for functions.php and up to content.php
* internationalized
* removed extraneous action filter for personal social icons * removed dashboard widget
* finished internationalizing strings
* generated po & mo files * removed compass mixins
